articles.title: U.S. Can Never Justify Screening and Distribution of Reactionary Movie: Policy Department of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Justify Screening and Distribution of Reactionary Movie: Policy Department of NDC of DPRK
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK Saturday issued a statement denouncing the U.S. for screening even dishonest and reactionary movie hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and agitating terrorism while groundlessly linking the unheard-of hacking at the Sony Pictures Entertainment to the DPRK.
					 The statement said that much scared at the hacking attack of justice made by the "guardians of peace", the Sony Pictures Entertainment hastily suspended the screening of the above-said movie. But at the zealous prodding of the U.S. administration and wicked conservative forces, it again buckled down to distributing the movie, failing to guess a miserable fate to be faced by it in the future, it added:
					
					 U.S. President Obama is the chief culprit who forced the Sony Pictures Entertainment to "indiscriminately distribute" the movie and took the lead in appeasing and blackmailing cinema houses and theatres in the U.S. mainland to distribute the movie.
					
					 Obama always goes reckless in words and deeds like a monkey in a tropical forest. When the Sony Pictures Entertainment made public a statement that it would give up the distribution of the movie, frightened by the merciless retaliatory strike, Obama urged it to unconditionally screen the movie, claiming that the disgrace suffered by Sony Pictures Entertainment means sorrow of the U.S., why did it issue such a statement as holding a white flag without informing the president of it?,  it is the violation of the freedom of expression and a threat to the security of the U.S. and it is necessary to make symmetric counteraction, considering the hacking attack was made by "north Korea", though it is not clear who was behind it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Dancing to the tune of Obama's outbursts, Kerry, McCain, Bolton and other wicked conservative politicians zealously prodded the Sony Pictures Entertainment into distributing the movie, blustering who else but "north Korea" caused property losses worth hundreds of millions of dollars to it.
					
					 If the U.S. is to persistently insist that the hacking attack was made by the DPRK, the U.S. should produce evidence without fail, though belatedly.
					
					 If the U.S. cannot open to public evidence due to "protection of sensitive information source" as expressed by the FBI, the U.S. may conduct a joint investigation with the DPRK in camera.
					
					 However, the U.S. is behaving recklessly, trumpeting about "symmetric counteraction", "combination of invisible sanctions and visible sanctions" and "re-designation of sponsor of terrorism" while linking the hacking attack with the DPRK without clear evidence and sure ground.
					
					 In actuality, the U.S., a big country, started disturbing the internet operation of major media of the DPRK, not knowing shame like children playing a tag.
					
					 We had already warned the U.S. not act like beating air after being hit hard by others.
					
					 Of course, we do not expect the gangsters to pay heed to our warnings.
					
					 When the public is becoming increasingly vocal about the hacking attack on the DPRK media this time, the U.S. feigned ignorance, saying that they should ask "north Korea" and the U.S. neither admits nor denies.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly shows that the U.S. is adding to its crimes by screening the movie "The Interview." 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. justify the screening and distribution of the movie.
					
					 This is because "The Interview" is an illegal, dishonest and reactionary movie quite contrary to the UN Charter, which regards respect for sovereignty, non-interference in internal affairs and protection of human rights as a legal keynote, and international laws.
					
					 It is also because it is a new politically-motivated provocation made by the U.S., pursuant to its hostile policy toward the DPRK as it is a movie for agitating terrorism produced with high-ranking politicians of the U.S. administration involved.
					
					 This is the reason why the world is branding "The Interview" as a typical product of the U.S. anachronistic act of challenging not only the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK but also human justice and conscience and encroaching upon peace and security.
					
					 The anti-U.S. sacred war at present precisely means protecting justice and peace.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in American-style arrogant, high-handed and gangster-like arbitrary practices despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the U.S. should bear in mind that its failed political affairs will face inescapable deadly blows.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Norodom Sihamoni, king of the Kingdom of Cambodia, on Dec. 16.
					 The message said:
					
					 Great Queen Her Majesty Norodom Monineath Sihanouk, the Cambodian people and I myself pay most reverential, highest and warmest tribute to HE Kim Jong Il, the distinguished and great leader of the Korean nation, who led the Korean people to victory and turned the DPRK into a country making a steady development with his indomitable patriotism and precious heroism, always alive as the outstanding and distinguished great man and hero in the minds of all people together with history, on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that Your Excellency will continue working for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, true to the will and great cause of the dignified great father.
					
					 I assure you that I myself pay great attention to the friendly and deep relations between our two countries.
					
					 The Kingdom of Cambodia will always make sincere efforts to maintain and develop the relations with your country.
					
					 Please accept Your Excellency First Secretary my highest regards.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda, on Dec. 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, together with Your Excellency and the Korean people, recollect the shining feats performed by HE Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Korean people, for them and other people of the world on the occasion of the third anniversary of so sudden and so sorrowful demise of the leader.
					
					 He devoted his whole life to the great politic-economic and social development of the DPRK.
					
					 His exploits will last forever.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards to Your Excellency.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from President of Burundi
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from President of Burundi
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Pierre Nkurunziza, president of the Republic of Burundi, on Dec. 17.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the people and government of the Republic of Burundi and on my own behalf, express heartfelt consolation and deepest reverence to you on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of HE Kim Jong Il, the eternal leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we affirm our firm resolution to make efforts to boost the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 Reaffirming to Your Excellency and the people of the DPRK our commitment to boosting the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, we send highest regards to Your Excellency.

articles.title: Ethiopian President Hopes for Korean People's Success in Economic Development
articles.content:
Ethiopian President Hopes for Korean People's Success in Economic Development
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Ho, DPRK ambassador to Ethiopia, presented his credentials to its President Mulatu Teshome on Dec. 23.
					 The president wished the Korean people great success in the economic development of the country under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rest Home for Farmers Receives Holiday-makers in Kaesong
articles.content:
Rest Home for Farmers Receives Holiday-makers in Kaesong
Kaesong, December 27 (KCNA) -- Winter recreation for farmers began at the Songaksan Rest Home in Kaesong City, the DPRK.
					 Exemplary agricultural workers who over-fulfilled their grain production quotas for this year are having a good time there.
					
					 They visit historical buildings in the city associated with the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and historical relics showing the wisdom and talents of the Koreans and also climb Mt. Songak.
					
					 Drawing attention are Korean chess, yut games, table-tennis and volleyball games of holiday-makers.

articles.title: Seminars on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Held by Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Seminars on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Held by Chongryon Officials
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) to renew the will to grasp Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as firm guidelines at organizations of Chongryon to mark the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 A seminar was held by the Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon at its hall on Dec. 18. 
					
					 Present there were Han Tong Song, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and Chairman Jo Il Yon and officials of the Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon. 
					
					 The speakers highly praised President Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and Kim Jong Il who led the drive for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and led the revolution and construction to victory. 
					
					 They praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for developing in depth Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism into the only guidelines of the DPRK.
					
					 They renewed their resolution to further glorify the leadership exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the movement of Koreans in Japan and usher in a new heyday of Chongryon true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un to mark the diamond jubilee of Chongryon. 
					
					 A seminar took place at the Korean Press Hall in Tokyo under the sponsorship of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan on Dec. 15. 
					
					 Speakers there said they would thoroughly establish the ideological system and leadership system of Juche in Chongryon and perform the vanguard role of the rising generation in the patriotic movement despite any storm and stress with the might of idea and single-minded unity, as required by the developing reality.
					
					Meanwhile, speakers at the seminar held at the hall of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon said that they would always bear in mind Kim Jong Un's teaching that a man serving the people is a genuine Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist and devotedly work for the compatriots in Japan, relying on them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Plot to Cook up Hideous Case
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Plot to Cook up Hideous Case
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The self-styled "group against atomic power stations" of south Korea recently posted on internet designs of atomic power stations and warned that it would destroy them again if they do not stop operating for three months. In this connection, the relevant organs of south Korea declared a state of round-the-clock emergency and a joint investigation team started full-scale investigation. 
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are working hard to link this case with the DPRK though the truth about it has not been probed. This is the same conspiratorial farce as the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is busy cooking up the same hideous case as what the Lee Myung Bak group did at the order of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. recently termed a cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment "deed of north Korea" but when the DPRK proposed the U.S. to make a joint investigation, the U.S. hastily refused it. The true colors of the U.S. were brought to light. That is why the international community is becoming vociferous asking the U.S. why it refused the joint investigation. 
					
					 It is meaningful that the above-said designs were posted on internet. It is said that the designs were made by the U.S. Therefore, if an investigation is made into who is behind the case, the U.S. tentacles will be disclosed. 
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are escalating the anti-DPRK smear campaign in collusion with the U.S. 
					
					 This is aimed at tiding over their ruling crisis by escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north as it is getting ever more serious due to their traitorous and unpopular behaviors including Jong Yun Hoe's interference in state affairs and the decision to forcibly disband the Unified Progressive Party. 
					
					 All the facts bring to light the true colors of the south Korean authorities who are desperately hurting the fellow countrymen while kowtowing to the U.S. master.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Puppet Group's Reckless Acts against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Puppet Group's Reckless Acts against DPRK
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the south Korean group of traitors took the lead in fabricating the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK at the third committee of the 69th UN General Assembly in November. Not content with this, they were busy doing harm to the compatriots and provoking them at the session of the UN General Assembly and the UNSC.
					 When the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" was rammed through the UN General Assembly and adopted at the UNSC as an official agenda item through their persistent begging, they "hailed" it and asserted "it was done under the pressure of the international community". Meanwhile, they unreasonably urged the DPRK to take a "concrete and practical step" for "improving the human rights".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary says: It is disgusting, indeed, to see the disgraceful behavior of the colonial puppet forces as they are not qualified to talk about human rights.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is none other than the present puppet ruling forces who have turned south Korea into the worst dictatorial society in the world and tundra of human rights while perpetrating fascist arbitrary practices unprecedented in the world.
					
					 Great irony is that those idiots who do not know what politics is like and lost the elementary sense of the situation are going reckless, unaware that the anti-DPRK "human rights" offensive is nothing more than the last-ditch charade of their master.
					
					 They cannot behave otherwise as they have prolonged their remaining days by blindly following their master without any principle.
					
					 What we would like to advice them is that their calculation is nothing but a daydream.
					
					 We would like to advice those who listen to the puppet forces, old hands at plot hatching and fabrications, not to have the same fate as that of rabid dogs running about in rain.

articles.title: U.S. Ambition for World Domination Can Never Come True: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition for World Domination Can Never Come True: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The senator of the U.S. from the Republican Party who is supposed to chair the Armed Services Committee of the U.S. Senate from coming January, said to American media including the Los Angeles Times that there is no reason not to carry out a test of nuclear weapon as it serves as the groundwork of national security. He made nonsensical remarks that to steadily run an old machine is like to step on thin ice and that nobody can know how his car will operate without turning its key. John Hamre, president of the Centre for Strategic and International Studies, chimed in with him, saying he is doubtful of the confidence in the nuclear weapons as they are very old and that it is necessary to carry out a test by manufacturing a new nuclear warhead.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 Washington which cried out for building a "world without nuclear weapons" now underlines the necessity of carrying out a nuclear test. Lurking behind this is an aim to realize its strategy for world domination through an unchallenged nuclear upper-hand. 
					
					 The U.S. brigandish theory is that it may possess nuclear weapons and conduct nuclear test as it pleases but other countries cannot have access to them as they may make an "intolerable" provocation threatening the world peace. 
					
					 Based on this theory the U.S. is kicking up rackets while closely watching those countries seeking the development of nuclear energy for peaceful purpose. 
					
					 The U.S. has often talked about "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK. 
					
					 The present situation on the Korean Peninsula forces the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear force. 
					
					 Denuclearization and stability of the world can never be achieved as long as there are the U.S. nuclear maniacs trying to realize at any cost the strategy for world domination on the basis of the unchallenged nuclear edge. 
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, given the persistent nuclear threat from the imperialists.

articles.title: Victory of Socialism Is One of Idea and Faith and Revolutionary Morality: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Victory of Socialism Is One of Idea and Faith and Revolutionary Morality: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries". 
					 The work, published on December 25, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that it is the requirement of the revolution to respect the forerunners of the revolution. It also deals with the principled matters arising in establishing the moral trait of respecting the forerunners of the revolution and developing the relationship based on noble moral obligation among people.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward it as an important issue related to the destiny of the revolution and socialism to respect the revolutionary forerunners and created a shining example of the revolutionary moral obligation during the whole period of his revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Several decades of his revolutionary leadership marked the sacred history that glorified the DPRK as an invincible fortress of socialism in which the red flag associated with blood and soul of the revolutionary forerunners has been held aloft century after century, and as a power of the single-minded unity where all the service personnel and people are rallied close around the leader and firmly united with bloody ties and obligation.
					
					 The great tradition of the revolutionary moral obligation provided by the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu is being given steady continuity in the drive in the new century of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He has solved all the issues arising in holding President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever, firmly adhered to their ideas and feats and carried out the revolution and construction exactly the way they did.
					
					 It is his lifetime mission and ultimate aim of struggle to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Our society is becoming a more harmonious big family in which all the people help and lead each other forward, thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme incarnation of the revolutionary moral obligation.
					
					 It has been fully proved through our practices that the victory of socialism is the one of idea and faith and revolutionary moral obligation.

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying Korean-style Socialism Centered on People
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying Korean-style Socialism Centered on People
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Papers here Saturday dedicate editorials to the 42nd anniversary of "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" promulgated by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that Korean-style socialism is the greatest legacy left by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il out of patriotism and genuine socialism centered on the popular masses without an equal in the world.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The world knows no such socialism as the one in the DPRK winning only victories amid absolute support of all service personnel and people while preserving its revolutionary nature despite all storms of history.
					
					 "One for all and all for one!" This collectivist spirit is prevailing throughout the country and all people are living as members of a big family. Such true pictures of Korean-style socialism can never be imitated by capitalism.
					
					 In the capitalist society young people are falling victims to all social evils and becoming mental cripples seized by extreme individualism and corrupt culture. This reality clearly proves the advantages of Korean-style socialism where the love for the future, rising generation is in full bloom.
					
					 Socialism is what keeps the Korean people alive.
					
					 The history of victory of Korean-style socialism is shining with that of the harmonious whole of the leader and the people.
					
					 The daily calls for steadily glorifying the most advantageous Korean-style socialism in the world under the guidance of the great party and translating all dreams and idea of the people into a brilliant reality.
					
					 Minju Joson notes that Korea-style socialism centered on the popular masses is invincible as there are Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Constitution, a political weapon for putting all dreams and idea of people into reality, and service personnel and people remaining true to the leadership of the great party.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Ushering in Second June 15 Era
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Ushering in Second June 15 Era
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), on Dec. 16 issued an article calling for shattering the fascist dictatorship of the south Korean puppet regime and ushering in the second June 15 era through solidarity and alliance of progressive forces.
					 The tendency of treachery which the anti-reunification sycophantic and traitorous regime of Park Geun Hye inherited from Lee Myung Bak led to such suppression of democracy, unprecedented in history, as the decision on disbanding the Unified Progressive Party in the wake of the crackdown on Pomminryon, the article said.
					
					 The south Korean people are staging a dynamic action in all parts of south Korea as they cannot expect the future of the nation and the people's life owing to the politics in confusion, people's life at stake and comprador-dominated diplomacy, it noted, and continued:
					
					 Only unity can help beat back foreign forces and dictatorship and achieve independent reunification, democracy and civil rights.
					
					 The important task for 2015 is for all progressive reform forces to pool their efforts to implement the June 15 joint declaration and win democracy and disallow the conservative forces' dictatorship, war and confrontation at a time when democracy and reunification are suffocated.
					
					 Let all patriots and people work hard to usher in the second June 15 era and build huge ranks of people through a large alliance against conservatives to put an end to the dictatorial rule.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Blaming DPRK for Cyber Attack
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Blaming DPRK for Cyber Attack
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Korean intellectuals in the U.S. on Dec. 20 held emergency round-table talks in Los Angels and accused Washington of shifting the blame for the cyber attack on Sony Pictures Entertainment onto the DPRK.
					 They said the U.S. accusation against the north over the cyber attack on the movie company is just the same as the claim that the sinking of Cheonan warship was caused by the north.
					
					 They called for letting people know what brutal and harsh policy the U.S. has enforced against the north.
					
					 They called on the Koreans from all walks of life to make increased efforts to have a correct understanding of the north in the future.

articles.title: U.S.-sponsored Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" Rejected by Organization of Koreans in China
articles.content:
U.S.-sponsored Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" Rejected by Organization of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China in a statement released on Dec. 22 blasted the U.S. and other forces hostile toward the DPRK for ramming the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through a recent session of the UN General Assembly.
					 The general association and all Koreans in China vehemently oppose and reject the hostile forces' high-handed and arbitrary practices, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. staged the farce of adopting the "human rights issue" of the DPRK as an official agenda item of the UN Security Council by setting in motion its satellite countries in utter disregard of procedures and regulations of the UN. This clearly proves its dangerous political scenario to invent a pretext for mounting an invasion of the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights."
					
					 The general association and all Koreans in China will join the people in the homeland in the struggle to foil the hostile forces' reckless "human rights" campaign through the toughest counteraction and protect the socialist system.

articles.title: Cambodian Party Praises Kim Jong Il's Noble Life
articles.content:
Cambodian Party Praises Kim Jong Il's Noble Life
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia made public a statement on Dec. 17, the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The demise of HE Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who performed great feats for the cause of the country and the nation was a great loss not only to the Korean people but to the progressives of the world.
					
					 The noble life of Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started by HE Generalissimo Kim Il Sung will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The December 8th issue of the Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda devoted one whole page to articles titled "Shining Star over Mt. Paektu" and "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" under the headline of "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper said: Kim Jong Il, who was born in Mt. Paektu and grew up while hearing gun-reports as lullaby during the anti-Japanese struggle, was highly praised as the Shining Star over Mt. Paektu by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters.
					
					 He entered Kim Il Sung University with a noble aim to glorify Korea. He turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power, guided by his faith and will.
					
					 The thunder over Jong Il peak has become a symbol of his great personality, the paper noted, introducing the strong pluck and courage of the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu with which he brought about steady victories in the confrontation with the U.S. and such eye-opening event as the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Another newspaper of Russia Argumenti Nedeli on Dec. 11 introduced the cause of immortalizing the leader in the DPRK illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A Vietnamese newspaper on Dec. 17 carried an article praising the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il illustrated with a portrait of the smiling leader.
					
					 The Zambian newspaper Post on Dec. 12 carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and stressed that he was the great master of independent politics to be specially recorded in the world history of politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Brazil
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in pamphlet by the foreign languages publishing house in Sao Paulo City, Brazil on Dec. 15.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the Korean revolutionary cause to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It indicates tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Germany
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" was brought out in booklet by a media print publishing house in Berlin, Germany.
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU. In the speech he expressed his firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generation. 
					
					 The work indicates the tasks and ways to bring up the KCU members as knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy reserve forces which will be responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Dec. 19.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasions of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They included a memorial meeting, photo exhibition and film show in the Czech Republic, Kimjongilia show in China and film show in Thailand from Dec 12 to 17.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Kimjongilias in full bloom at the venue of the show presented fantastic scenery.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun."
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said in a speech:
					
					 At the end of the last century the Korean people rose up with courage despite the vicious moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and severe natural disasters that lasted for several years. This was entirely ascribable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He trained the KPA to be an invincible army, protected the revolutionary gains and laid a solid foundation for building a thriving nation with the KPA as a main force.
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is now successfully carrying forward his cause, the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The first chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia praised Kim Jong Il as the great man boundlessly revered by the world progressives.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Remarks against DPRK
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Dec. 12 in denunciation of the south Korean puppet forces' reckless remarks escalating the confrontation between the north and the south.
					 Fully supporting the information bulletin of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the statement continued:
					
					 "Unification under liberal democracy" touted by the south Korean puppet forces is a blatant challenge to the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 This is aimed to bring down the socialist system in the DPRK and it can bring a war, not peace to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 In this regard we hold that Korea should be reunified to suit the actual conditions of the peninsula, not the way "Germany was unified."
					
					 Korean socialism is independent and is not a replica of other country.
					
					 "Unification under liberal democracy" trumpeted about by the south Korean puppet forces is not democratic but a fascist one.
					
					 Lots of revolutionaries and patriots have been mercilessly massacred by the fascist puppet regime in south Korea.
					
					 What the south Korean puppet forces seek is "to achieve unification by absorbing" socialist Korea.
					
					 Their call for the construction of "world peace park" in the demilitarized zone is just like a reckless remark of a person who contracted dementia.
					
					 We are opposed to the U.S. imperialists' colonial rule over south Korea.

articles.title: EE.UU. no puede justificar la proyeccion de pelicula reaccionaria, insiste portavoz de DP de CDN
articles.content:
EE.UU. no puede justificar la proyeccion de pelicula reaccionaria, insiste portavoz de DP de CDN
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 27 una declaracion denunciando a Estados Unidos que vinculando injustamente con la RPDC el ataque cibernetico sufrido por Sony Pictures Entertainment, pretende proyectar a toda costa una pelicula reaccionaria que calumnia la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y agita el terrorismo. 
					Sony Pictures Entertainment, que habia suspendido precipitadamente tal proyeccion por el justo ataque cibernetico de "Defensores de la Paz", vuelve a divulgar la pelicula a instigacion de la administracion estadounidense y las fuerzas conservadoras de peor calana sin prever su destino tragico, revela la nota y continua:
					
					Quien instiga al frente la divulgacion de la pelicula reaccionaria es el presidente estadounidense Obama, quien obligo a Sony Pictures Entertainment la "distribucion indiscriminada" y ejercio el chantaje y adormecimiento a los cines y teatros de EE.UU. 
					
					Obama con la cara de un mono que habita en las selvas tropicales es indiscreto siempre en palabras y acciones.
					
					Tan pronto como Sony Pictures Entertainment, aturdida por el despiadado ataque de venganza, publicara la declaracion sobre el cese de divulgacion de la pelicula reaccionaria, Obama le urgio la proyeccion incondicional diciendo que "es verguenza de Sony Pictures Entertainment y tristeza de Estados Unidos", "?por que publico aquella declaracion de arrodillamiento sin avisar al presidente?", "es violacion de la libertad de expresion y peligro a la seguridad de EE.UU." y "hay que tomar las contramedidas proporcionales definiendo al Norte de Corea como culpable aunque es incierto el controlador de hacking". 
					
					Kerry, McCain, Bolton y otros politiqueros conservadores tambien estan acorde con la "decision" de Obama insistiendo en que nadie en este mundo, excepto al "Norte de Corea", causo a la maxima distribuidora de fabricacion de pelicula los danos de bienes valorados en cien millones de dolares. 
					
					Si EE.UU. quiere acusar a la RPDC de hacker, debe testimoniarlo aunque sea ahora. 
					
					Si no puede publicar las pruebas por la "proteccion de fuente de informaciones sensibles", como insiste el Buro Federal de Investigacion (FBI en ingles), podria hacer a puertas cerradas la investigacion conjunta con nosotros. 
					
					Pero, sin tener pruebas ni motivos evidentes, EE.UU. vincula injustamente con la RPDC el presente hacking lamentable insistiendo en "tomar las contramedidas proporcionales", "combinar la sancion invisible con la otra visible" y "redeterminar los paises que apoyan el terrorismo". 
					
					Realmente, el pais norteamericano corpulento comenzo a estorbar la operacion via internet de los principales medios de prensa de la RPDC sin sentir la verguenza como los mocosuelos en juego de escondite. 
					
					Ya hemos advertido a EE.UU. a actuar con prudencia. 
					
					Claro que no esperamos que los gangsteres aceptaran esta advertencia. 
					
					Al ver que se hacen fuertes las criticas de la opinion publica sobre el reciente hacking contra los medios de prensa norcoreanos, EE.UU. dice groseramente que "pregunten al Norte de Corea" y que "no lo reconocemos ni lo negamos". 
					
					La situacion demuestra que EE.UU. abulta su expediente criminal con la proyeccion de la pelicula "The Interview". 
					
					EE.UU. no puede justificar en ningun caso la proyeccion y divulgacion de la pelicula reaccionaria "The Interview", porque esta pelicula ilicita contraviene completamente a la Carta de la ONU y la ley internacional que toman por su fundamento legal el respeto a la soberania, la no intervencion en los asuntos internos y la defensa de los derechos humanos. 
					
					Y "The Interview", siendo un medio de agitacion terrorista producido bajo la participacion de los politiqueros de alto rango de la administracion norteamericana, resulta una nueva provocacion politica causada por la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					He aqui la razon de que el mundo califica "The Interview" de producto tipico de anacronismo de EE.UU. que calumnia la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, desafia a la justicia y la conciencia de la humanidad y perturba la paz y la seguridad. 
					
					La guerra antiyanqui de hoy es la de defensa de la justicia y la paz. 
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente que si sigue recurriendo a la arrogancia, el despotismo y las arbitrariedades al estilo norteamericano, la politica en decadencia de su propio pais sufrira el golpe demoledor irreparable.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de rey de Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de rey de Cambodia
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le remitiera el dia 16 Norodom Sihamoni, rey de Camboya.
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia Primer Secretario,
					
					En ocasion del 3o aniversario del fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Dirigente Kim Jong Il, destacado y gran lider de la nacion coreana, su Majestad la gran Emperatriz Norodom Monineath Sihanouk, el pueblo camboyano y yo mismo dirigimos la mas sublime consideracion a el quien junto con la historia esta vivo como gran hombre destacado y extraordinario y heroe en el alma de todos los hombres por haber dirigido al pueblo coreano a la victoria y convertido la RPDC en un pais en desarrollo incesante con su indoblegable patriotismo y valioso heroismo.
					
					Estoy convencido de que Su Excelencia seguira trabajando por la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana en acato a la noble causa de los dignos y grandes padres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ratifico a Vd. que yo mismo presto gran interes a las profundas relaciones amistosas entre nuestros dos paises.
					
					El Reino de Cambodia se esforzara siempre con toda sinceridad para mantener y desarrollar las relaciones con vuestro pais.
					
					Extiendo la mas alta consideracion a Su Excelencia, Primer Secretario.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente de Burundi
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente de Burundi
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le remitiera el dia 17 Pierre Nkurunziza, presidente de la Republica de Burundi.
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 3o aniversario del fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, eterno lider del pueblo coreano, manifiesto el sincero consuelo y el mas profundo sentimiento de veneracion a Vd. en nombre del pueblo y gobierno de la Republica de Burundi y en el mio propio. 
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para confirmar la firme decision de esforzarnos por intensificar mas las excelentes relaciones de  amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Reafirmo a Su Excelencia y al pueblo de la RPDC nuestra promesa de consolidar mas las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises y expreso la mas alta consideracion a Su Excelencia.

articles.title: Presidente etiope desea al pueblo coreano exitos en desarrollo economico
articles.content:
Presidente etiope desea al pueblo coreano exitos en desarrollo economico
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Chol Ho, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presento el dia 23 sus cartas credenciales ante Mulatu Teshome, presidente de la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia.
					En la ocasion, el mandatario etiope deseo al pueblo coreano notables exitos en el desarrollo economico del pais bajo la sabia direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un.
